title: Highlight Presenting Complaint on Case Cards

requirements.summary: Visually emphasize Presenting Complaint on CaseCard with a distinct blue bordered/filled box that works in light and dark themes.
acceptanceCriteria: In the main case list view, when a case has a non-empty Presenting Complaint, it is displayed inside a visually distinct blue box (border and subtle background fill) on the CaseCard.
The Presenting Complaint emphasis styling works in both light and dark themes and does not reduce readability.
No user-facing text labels are changed; the label remains “Presenting Complaint”.

file_operations.description: Update the Presenting Complaint rendering to wrap the text in a padded, rounded blue-emphasis container (blue border + subtle blue background) with appropriate light/dark Tailwind classes, matching the prominence level of the existing emphasized Notes styling while keeping the label text unchanged.
